action.name: Script: app = getMapValue(apps, value); global_last_selected_app = app
Script: cleanup
Script: dbot_cmd_prefix = "@bluscream "; author = split(notification_text, "\n")[2]; author = split(author, " ")[0]; notification_text_lower= toLowerCase(notification_text);
Script: dbot_msg_prefix = ":robot: "; device_model = trim(device_model); device_version = trim(device_version); dbot_suffix = "\n\nSent from my {device_model} running Android {device_version}.";
Script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];
action.script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];

action.name: Script: frequencies = trim(frequencies); frequencies = split(frequencies, " "); freq = newList(); for (x in frequencies) { x = x / 1000; addElement(freq, x) } freq = replace(freq, "[", ""); freq = replace(freq, "]", ""); freq = replace(freq, " ", ""); //mfreq = "{mfreq, numberformat, #}" / 1000
script: get links list

Script: global_device_model = trim(device_model); global_android_version = trim(android_version); global_octodroid_name = package_info["com.gh4a"]["application_info"]["label"]; global_octodroid_version = package_info["com.gh4a"]["version_name"];

Script: global_force_refresh_apps = false; keys = getMapKeys(global_package_info); apps = newMap(); names = newList(); for (k in keys) { name = getAppName(k); addElement(names, name); addMapEntry(apps, name, k); } sort(names);
Script: governors = trim(governors); governors = split(governors, " "); governors = replace(governors, "[", ""); governors = replace(governors, "]", ""); governors = replace(governors, " ", "");

Script: if(path==null) { path=newList(); p=0; addElement(path,getMapValue(getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,p)),'application_info'),'source_dir')); }; if(path!=null) { while(p<length(app)-1) { p=p+1; addElement(path,getMapValue(getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,p)),'application_info'),'source_dir')); }; }; if(version==null) { version=newList(); v=0; addElement(version,getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,v)),'version_name')); }; if(path!=null) { while(v<length(app)-1) { v=v+1; addElement(version,getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,v)),'version_name')); }; }; m=-1; n=-1; o=-1;
Script: keys=getMapKeys(package_info); apps=newMap(); names=newList(); for(k in keys) {name=getAppName(k); addElement(names,name); addMapEntry(apps,name,k);} sort(names);
Script: m=m+1; n=n+1; o=o+1; mov=getElement(path,m); val=getElement(value,n); ver=getElement(version,o);
Script: msg = "Mobile Discord Selfbot by Bluscream :joy:"

Script: keys=getMapKeys(package_info); apps=newMap(); names=newList(); for(k in keys) {name=getAppName(k); addElement(names,name); addMapEntry(apps,name,k);} sort(names);
Init Variable Package Info: {x} into package_info

Script: if(path==null) { path=newList(); p=0; addElement(path,getMapValue(getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,p)),'application_info'),'source_dir')); }; if(path!=null) { while(p<length(app)-1) { p=p+1; addElement(path,getMapValue(getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,p)),'application_info'),'source_dir')); }; }; if(version==null) { version=newList(); v=0; addElement(version,getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,v)),'version_name')); }; if(path!=null) { while(v<length(app)-1) { v=v+1; addElement(version,getMapValue(getMapValue(package_info,getElement(app,v)),'version_name')); }; }; m=-1; n=-1; o=-1;
Script: m=m+1; n=n+1; o=o+1; mov=getElement(path,m); val=getElement(value,n); ver=getElement(version,o);
Copy File: {mov} to /sdcard/Automagic Services/Apps' Backup/{val} v {ver}.apk
Notification on Screen: App "{val}" backed up successfully!

flow.name: Octodroid Signature
flow.actioncontainer: Hide Custom Widget Overlay: Intercept Octodroid message
Set Default Input Method: Automagic Premium
Set Default Input Method: Hacker's Keyboard
Show Custom Widget Overlay: Intercept Octodroid message, Octodroid send message (60*120) Center Right
Init Variable Package Info: com.gh4a into package_info

Control UI: signature = '

---
Sent from my '+ global_device_model +' running Android '+ global_device_version +' via '+ global_octodroid_name +' v'+ global_octodroid_version; /*if (text == null){ text = getTextById("com.gh4a:id/basic_editor_scroll"); }*/ sendText(signature); //setText2ById("com.gh4a:id/basi

Script: global_device_model = trim(device_model); global_android_version = trim(android_version); global_octodroid_name = package_info["com.gh4a"]["application_info"]["label"]; global_octodroid_version = package_info["com.gh4a"]["version_name"];
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: containsElement(newList('Automagic Startup', 'Manual'), trigger) or global_octodroid_name == null
Expression: trigger == 'Octodroid input detected' and source_class_name == "android.widget.MultiAutoCompleteTextView" and before_text == "" and global_octodroid_version != null

flow.name: Update Adblocking
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Root Command: mv /storage/emulated/0/Download/hosts /system/etc/hosts as root in /

Execute Root Command: chmod 644 /system/etc/hosts as root in /
Execute Root Command: mount -o ro,remount -t rootfs /system as root in /
flow.conditioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar Displayed: com.android.providers.downloads Text contains text hosts
flow.actioncontainer: Execute Root Command: cat /proc/mounts as root in /
Execute Root Command: mount -o rw,remount -t rootfs /system as root in /
